channel.title: Release Notes - 2007 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2007 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.PDF for .Net 3.6.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for .Net 3.6.0.0 New Release Introduction In this release, XML meta data is supported when creating PDF.Metadata is any data that helps to describe the content or characteristics of a file.By providing a standard, W3C-compliant way of tagging files with metadata across products from Adobe and other vendors, XMP is a powerful solution enabler. Some new features like rich formatting list labels and Non-breaking space are also supported in this release.

item.title: Aspose.PDF for .NET 3.5.8.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for .Net 3.5.8.0 Hot Fix What’s Fixed? 3477 - Text goes to new page while there is enough space 3487 - paragraph keep with next property not working correctly 3581 - RTF to PDF: Empty lines are removed in tables 3545 - Unwanted space at the begining of a new line 3390 - Width problem converting HTML table to Pdf 3315 - HTML2PDF table border and column width 3491 - Incorrect conversion of document 3569 - PDF: Formatting Destroyed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF for .NET 3.5.7.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for .Net 3.5.7.0 Hot Fix What’s New? 3514 - Embedded ImageData as Base64 string is supported in XML . New element is supported in element. What’s Fixed? 3487 - paragraph keep with next property not working correctly 3453 - Unwanted Tab in Word2Pdf 3250 - HTML2PDF exception is thrown for nested table 3506 - Invalid index in Segments indexer Exception 3511 - Replaceable symbol $Sp evaluates to zero on every page 3512 - Error when generating a PDF from an XSL FO stylesheet 3488 - PNG image lose resulution 3536 - PDF generation from Word failure 3366 - HTML to PDF formatting 3492 - Weird on the footnote 3565 - Aligment when converted to pdf is messed up

item.title: Aspose.PDF for .NET 3.5.6.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for .Net 3.5.6.0 Hot Fix What’s New? 3420 - Non-breaking space. Non-breaking space is supported by new symbol #$NBS. What’s Fixed? 3455 - Word to PDF - Text aren’t align 3453 - Lose FootNote from Word to PDF 3478 - Top and bottom margins don’t work for text in table cell 3483 - Next section renders over the text of the previous section 3482 - Underlined tabs rendered in wrong position 3423 - Inline HTML does not use font setting of segment 3454 - Cell padding changed in Word2Pdf 3484 - First row loses alignment when table is broken into new page 3472 - Jump Page on page 2 3187 - Word to PDF the footnotes aren’t correctly display 3456 - Word document fields wrapping when converted to PDF 3473 - Text border does not work well

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.1.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.1.0.0 New Release Version 2.1.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 1.0.x while the following is a quick list: added: support for page rotation. Please refer to Aspose.PDF hotfix 2.0.1 Released!. added: support for keeping paragraphs together when breaking page. Please refer to Aspose.PDF hotfix 2.0.2 released!. added: support for column. Please refer to Aspose.PDF Hotfix 2.0.4 Released!. added: support for adding all frames of TIFF image automatically.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.1.14.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.1.14.0 Hot Fix In this fix:1) A bug about text border is fixed.2) A text missing bug is fixed.3) A bug that throw “Previous heading must be set in when insert heading in API”is fixed. 4) .NET framework 2.0 and Visual Studio 2005 is now supported.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.2.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.2.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF version 2.2.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 2.1.x while the following is a quick list: \1) added: support for .NET framework 2.0 and Visual Studio 2005. \2) added: support for restarting page number at section level. Refer to . \3) added: support for controling column display. Refer to . \4) added: support for fixed row height.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.2.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.2.1.0 Hot Fix In this hot fix: \1) Stroke operation out of scope bug is fixed. Please refer to \2) Hanging Indents bug is fixed. Please refer to .

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.2.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.2.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix, a bug about nested table is fixed. Please refer to for more info.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.2.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.2.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) A bold font format bing ignored bug is fixed. \2) A bug bug about heading in Multi-column is fixed. Please refer to for more info.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.2.4.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.2.4.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix, a bug about heading indent is fixed. Please refer to for more info.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.2.7.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.2.7.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix, page numbering is improved in order to make Word2Pdf work better.1) A new property “IsPageNumberForDocument”is added to Pdf class. If this property is set to true, the “$P” symbol will be replaced by the total page number of the document. Otherwise “$P” will be replaced with the total page number of all sections that were not restarted (“IsPageNumberRestarted” is set to true).

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.2.8.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.2.8.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix, a “null reference” bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.3.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.3.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF version 2.3.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 2.2.x while the following is a quick list:1) added: support for rowspan. A new property RowSpan is added into the Cell class; 2) improved: HTML2PDF; 3) improved: Table of content support; 4) improved: page numbering support; 5) improved: column support; 6) improved: Tab stop position support; 7) fixed: bugs in Word2Pdf; 8) fixed: bugs in nested table support;

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.4.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.4.0.0 New Release In this release:1) Aspose.PDF.Fo is merged into Aspose.PDF. The old “Convertor” class is removed. and . method is used to convert FO file. Please refer to and the features demo for more info. Sorry for the inconvenience that old Aspose.PDF.Fo customers have to change your code.2) Multi-thread problem reported in is solved.3) A bug reported in is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.4.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.4.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Table.IsFirstRowRepeated Bug fixed. Refer to . \2) Nested bullet points bug is fixed. Refer to . \3) Bug about text indent is fixed. Indent processing is improved.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .Net 2.4.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.4.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Space mising bug is fixed. Please refer to . \2) A bug about heading in table cell is fixed. Please refer to . \3) UNC path bug is fixed. Please refer to . \4) Since Aspose.PDF.Fo is merged into Aspose.PDF, Aspose.PDF can’t run in Visual Stodio 2005. This bug has been fixed in this hotfix.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.5.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.5.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF for .NET version 2.5.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 2.4.x while the following is a quick list: \1) Added: Support for image reuse. Please refer to . \2) improved: Processing for GIF and PNG. The pdf file size is greatly reduced. \3) Improved: Image processing in FO2PDF. The speed of image processing in FO2Pdf is greatly improved.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.5.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.5.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) “\v”problem in Heading(List) is fixed. Please refer to . \2) A bug about bold font is fixed. Please refer to . \3) A blank table row problem is fixed. Please refer to . \4) A list indents bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.5.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.5.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix, nested table rendering bug in 2.5.1 is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.5.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.5.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Arabic support is improved. Latin words in Arabic sentence is now supported. \2) Unicode is supported in HTML2PDF. \3) Tab stops in left-hanging text is supported well now. This makes Word2Pdf works better. \4) Bug about multi-thread is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.6.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.6.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF for .NET version 2.6.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 2.5.x while the following is a quick list: \1) Performance optimized. The new version is 10~40% faster than 2.5.3, especially for word to pdf conversion. Two new properties is added to improve the performace for unicode: Pdf., Pdf.. \2) Added: a new method Refer to .

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.6.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
Aspose.PDF .NET 2.6.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.6.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Table border bug in 2.6.1 is fixed. Refer to . \2) Table bug in Word2Pdf is fixed. Refer to \3) Background color and border for heading (list) is supported in Word2Pdf. Refer to Word to PDF issues. \4) Bug about multithread is fixed. Refer to .

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.6.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.6.3.0 Hot Fix In this hot fix: \1) License code is updated to avoid crypto error. \2) PNG image support is improved. Refer to . \3) A new replaceable symbol #$REFPAGE(paragraphID) is supported. This symbol indicates the page number of a specified paragraph. For example, #$REFPAGE(title) indicates the page number of the paragraph with ID “title”. \4) A new property is added into Row class.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.7.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.7.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF for .NET version 2.7.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 2.6.x while the following is a quick list: \1) Common HTML tags are supported in Text paragraph. These tags including font name, font size, font color, underline, italic, bold, strikeout, hyperlink, br, em, var, etc. 2) Manually table spliting is supported. A new property is added into Row class.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.7.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.7.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Fixed: a bug about list indent when the default tab stop position is set to 0; \2) Fixed: a bug about Row.IsNewPage. Refer to . \3) Fixed: a bug about png image size. Refer to . \4) Fixed: a bug about image deleting in Word2Pdf. Images that are not displayed in Word2Pdf can now be deleted.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.8.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.8.0.0 New Release In this release: \1) FloatingBox is supported. A new class is added. FloatingBox represents a area that contains one or more paragraphs. The position of the FloatingBox can be set by user on horizontal and vertical direction. Please refer to the API document and WIKI for more info. 2) HTML support in text paragraph is improved. Superscript and subscript is supported.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.8.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.8.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) A custom positioning bug is fixed. Refer to .2) Row span bugs fixed. Refer to and .

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.8.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.8.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) case-insensitive font name for truetype font is supported. Refer to \2) A table border bug is fixed. Refer to \3) Underline support is improved. Refer to

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.8.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.8.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) A image too large bug fixed is fixed. Refer to . 2) A bug in adjusting table width automatically is fixed. . 3) A floating box alignment bug is fixed. 4) A floating box padding bug is fixed. 5) Page count is supported. A new property is added into Pdf class. Refer to

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.8.4.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.8.4.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) A floating box bug is fixed. \2) A row span bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.8.5.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.8.5.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) UNC path bug in header is fixed. Refer to \2) A row height bug is fixed. Refer to \3) Double line borders for text, page and table are supported. A new method is added into the class. An example can be seen in the blog \4) PNG support is improved. Refer to .

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.9.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.9.0.0 New Release In this release: New features supported:1) Justification for multi-segment text is supported.2) Double line border is supported.3) Keeping several paragraphs together is supported. A new property Paragraph.IsKeptWithNext is added which indicates whether current paragraph remains in the same page along with next paragraph.4) Page count is supported. A new property Pdf.PageCount is added.5) Converting aspx page into PDF is supported.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.9.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.9.1.0 Hot Fix \1) TOC bug and text indent bug are fixed. Refer to 2) A nested table bug is fixed. Refer to 3) A right aligned and center aligned text rendering bug is fixed. Refer to 4) A underline bug is fixed. Refer to 5) A missing text bug is fixed. Refer to 6) Table bugs are fixed. A new property IsEmptyRowAtBottomShown is added into Table class.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.9.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.9.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Memory image for all image type is supported. A new property ImageInfo.ImageStream is added. Please refer to and 2) A new method Pdf.GetStringWidth() is added. Refer to 3) A hanging indentation bug in Word2Pdf is fixed. 4) TOC font bug is fixed. Refer to 5) Inline HTML in floating box is supported. Refer to 6) Paragraph Margins ignored bug in inline HTML is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.9.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.9.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Two edition types professional and enterprise have been changed to only one - enterprise. All features all available in this edition type.2) Text field has been improved. It can be displayed and printed well now.3) Invalid Scale Value bug is fixed. 4) Vertical aligmnent for rowspan is supported. Please refer to 5) Dash border bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.9.4.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.9.4.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Center and right alignment for multiple-segment text is improved. Refer to .2) Auto scale of large image when it is too large is supported.3) Inline HTML bug is fixed, 4) A image encryption bug has been fixed. 5) A heading indent bug in Word2Pdf is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.9.5.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.9.5.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix, \1) A auto image scaling bug is fixed. \2) A cener alignment bug for text is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 2.9.6.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 2.9.6.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: 1)HTML2PDF is improved. Text in body element is supported; “dfn” tag is supported; “hr” tag is improved; “ul”,“ol”,“li” tags are improved; Table support is improved; “hspace” and “vspace” in “img” tag is supported;2)A table rendering bug is fixed. Refer to 3)#$NP in heading bug is fixed. 4)Floating box in table is supported. 5)WMF can’t be open bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 3.0.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.0.0.0 New Release In this release: New features added:1) Inline paragraph. A new property InlineParagraph is added into Segment class. Image, Graph, FormField andAttachment can be used as inline paragraph. An example can be found at.2) Custom watermark. A new property Watermarks is added into Pdf class. An example for custom watermarkcan be found at .3) Table broken control at row level.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 3.0.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.0.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) ImageInfo.MemoryData, ImageInfo.OpenType and ImageInfo.BitsPerComponent are obsolete. URL is supported in Image.ImageInfo.File. Memory image is supported by Image.ImageInfo.ImageStream. Therefore ImageInfo.OpenType is not needed. Image.ImageHeight Image.ImageWidth are obsolete. These two property are only used to set the image width and height of CCITT image. New properties ImageInfo.CcittImageWidth and ImageInfo.CcittImageHeight are added. Please use the new properties instead.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 3.0.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.0.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) 64-bit windows is supported. Refer to 2) A Nested table bug is fixed. Refer to 3) A text merging bug is fixed. Refer to 4) Installer is supported in .NET 2.05) Performance for image is optimized. Refer to 6) A Image.FixHeight bug is fixed. Refer to

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.0.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.0.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) A new method GetTextHeight() is added into Text class.2) Two readonly peoperties BoxWidth and BoxHeight are added into class FloatingBox which are used to get the size of the floating box. 3) Performance for table is improved, refer to 4) A image size bug is fixed, refer to Image size bug. 5) IsKeptWithNext bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF for .NET version 3.1.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 3.0.x while the following is a quick list: Features added or improved:1) Image with fixed height is supported.2) Installer is supported in .NET 2.0.3) Getting text height is supported. A new method GetTextHeight() is added into Text class.4) Performance for table and image is improved.5) Roman page number is supported.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) “Keep with next” bug is fixed, Refer to 2) IsRowBroken bug is fixed. Refer to 3) Inline image in heading bug is fixed.4) Floating box bug is fixed. Refer to 5) xml:lang is supported in XML. This attribute can be used to set locale of the XML. Refer to 6) Table.RepeatingRows is supported. Refer to

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) HTML2PDF is improved. Refer to .2) “keep with next” bug in multi-column page is fixed. Refer to .3) A Right-aligned tabstop bug is fixed. Refer to .4) A table broken bug is fixed. Refer to .5) Truetype font is supported in XSL-FO2PDF.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) A bold font bug is fixed. Refer to .2) A table rendering bug is fixed. Refer to .3) Multi-page TIFF image with stream bug is fixed.4) A section breaking bug is fixed. Refer to .5) Some bugs in HTML2PDF are fixed. Refer to .

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.4.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.4.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Alignment for multi-segment text bug is fixed. Refer to .2) URL image bug is fixed. Refer to .3) Characters moving bug in multi-segment text is fixed.4) Keeping with next bug is fixed.5) Text alignment in footer bug is fixed. 6) Inline image and form field bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.5.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.5.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) System.Drawing.Image is supported. Refer to Image. and ImageInfo..2) URL image without image type is supported. For example, image.ImageInfo.File=.3) In XSL-FO2PDF, added support for border style properties other than the value of “solid”. Now all the property values for border styles are available.4) In XSL-FO2PDF, Fixed the case sensitive bug of font-color and background-color property .

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.6.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.6.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Decimal tabstop is supported. 2) A new method GetCell is added into Table class which is used to get a cell according to it’s row and column index. This is useful when row span or column span is set.3) Emf can’t delete bug is fixed. Refer to 4) Ashx is supported in HTML2PDF. Refer to 5) Closed stream bug in FO2PDF is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.1.7.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.1.7.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Some bugs in Html2Pdf is fixed. Please refer to and .2) Some bugs in Table is fixed. Refer to , and .3) Some bugs in Word2Pdf is fixed, including inline image bug, floating box in header bug, PolyDash in Rectangle bug. We also avoid throwing exceptions when the graph is too large.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.2.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.2.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF for .NET version 3.2.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 3.1.x while the following is a quick list: Features added or improved:1) Decimal tabstop is supported;2) Truetype font is supported in XSL-FO2PDF;3) Table.RepeatingRows is supported;4) System.Drawing.Image is supported;5) URL image without image type is supported;6) In XSL-FO2PDF, added support for border style properties other than the value of “solid"7) xml:lang is supported in XML;8) Word2Pdf feature is improved;9) Ashx is supported in HTML2Pdf.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.2.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.2.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) 64-bit windows problem is fixed. Refer to .2) DeEntitize() bug is fixed. Refer to .3) Table background color bug is fixed. Refer to .4) Segment background color and borders are supported.5) A floating box padding bug is fixed. Refer to .6) A list indent bug is fixed. Refer to .7) A new property IsDefaultAllAllowed is added into Security class.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.2.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.2.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) IsRowBroken with Fixed row hight bug fixed. Refer to .2) Some bug in Word2Pdf are fixed. Refer to , and .3) Vertical splitting of table is supported. A new property IsVerticalBroken is added into Table class. Refer to .4) A new method ImportDataTable(DataTable dataTable,bool isFieldNameShown,int firstRow,byte firstColumn,int dataRowIndex,int dataColumnIndex) is added into Table class to make data importing more flexible.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.3.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.3.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF for .NET version 3.3.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 3.2.x while the following is a quick list: Main features added or improved: \1) Bold and italic text is supported without bold or italic font. In the previous version, if you want to set text to font such as “Arial Bold”, the corresponding font arialbd.ttf must exist.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.3.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.3.1.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) “%” bug in HTML2Pdf is fixed. refer to .2) Auto-width column size is supported in table. Refer to .3) SetColumnWidth method is improved. Refer to 4) #$NC bug is fixed. Refer to 5) Long segment breaking bug is fixed, refer to 6) background color at document and section level is supported. A new property BackgroundColor is added into Pdf and Section class.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.3.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.3.2.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) TOC support in improved. Please refet to .2) Text overlapping bug is fixed. Refer to .3) Some inline image bugs are fixed.4) Multiple columns bug in 3.3.1.0 is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.3.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.3.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: In XSL-FO2PDF, keep-together=“always” is supported in block and block-container. In XSL-FO2PDF, performace is improved for truetype font. In XSL-FO2PDF, two bugs in block-container are fixed. <1> When the subelement can’t be output completely, the subelement will be ignored. <2> If block-container is used outside of flow and block-container, exception will be thrown. In XSL-FO2PDF, a bug on pagesequenceis fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.3.4.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.3.4.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Performance for truetype font processing in xsl-fo is improved. Refer to 2) Table broken bug for rowspan is fixed. Refer to 3) A page broken bug is fixed. Refer to 4) GetTextHeight() bugs are fixed. Refer to 5) HTML to PDF Conversion bugs are fixed. Refer to , , and .6) A bug about transparent PNG images from web is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.3.5.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.3.5.0 Hot Fix Main bugs fixed: \1) Extra text interted in pdf bug is fixed. Refer to 2) Text lost and cell shifted bug in Word2Pdf is fixed. Refer to 3) Html Bullet tags are supported in inline HTML. 4) Tab stop bug in Word2Pdf is fixed.5) Some bugs in table support in inline HTML is fixed. Refer to

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.0.0 New Release Aspose.PDF for .NET version 3.4.0.0 includes all the features provided in Hotfix 3.3.x while the following is a quick list: Main features added or improved: \1) Vertical text is supported in table and floating box. A new property VerticalTexRotationType is added into Cell and FloatingBox. \2) FootNote is supported. A new class FootNote is added. \3) AutoFitToContent in table is supported.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.1.0 Hot Fix Bugs fixed: \1) TOC printing bug and inline HTML bug. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/COMMUNITY/Forums/thread/74609.aspx. \2) Inline images bugs in Word2Pdf. \3) Vertical text bug in Excel2Pdf. \4) Heading.CompleteClone() bug. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/COMMUNITY/Forums/thread/74424.aspx New Features: \1) EndNote is supported. A new class EndNote is added.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.2.0 Hot Fix Bugs fixed: \1) Security bug when running under Partial Trust environment. Refer to . \2) Inline HTML bug. Refer to and . \3) GetObjectByID bug. Refer to . \4) Superscript with underline bug. Refer to

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.3.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Z-order of graph and image is supported. A new property ZIndex is added into Graph and Image classes. \2) Image too large bug is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/COMMUNITY/Forums/thread/75667.aspx. \3) A Table.IsFirstParagraphInColumn bug is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/COMMUNITY/Forums/thread/75605.aspx. \4) Heading level switch bug is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/COMMUNITY/Forums/thread/75493.aspx \5) A Word2Pdf performance bug is fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.4.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.4.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix \1) Radio Button Positioning is improved. Please refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/76679.aspx. \2) A security bug is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/76759.aspx. \3) Page column bug is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/76246.aspx. \4) A Cell margin bug in Word2Pdf is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/76511.aspx. \5) ZIndex for floatingBox is fixed. A new property ZIndex is added into FloatingBox class.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.5.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.5.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) Background color for text bug is fixed. \2) A table broken bug is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/COMMUNITY/Forums/thread/75586.aspx. \3) A Justify alignment bug for multi-column page is fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/77593.aspx. \4) A IsLandscape bug has been fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/77559.aspx. \5) A COM support bug has been fixed. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/77540.aspx. \6) A text alignment bug has been fixed.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.6.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.6.0 Hot Fix In this hotfix: \1) PDFNET-3097: “Word to PDF Error: Object reference not set to an instance of an object”. Please refer to . \2) PDFNET-3056: “Layout of the footnote is incorrect”. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/77107.aspx. \3) PDFNET-3063: “Table rows shifted to next page on Word2Pdf conversion”. Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/77436.aspx. \4) PDFNET-3118: “SelectBox: multiple select index support and border bug”.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.4.7.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.4.7.0 Hot Fix Bugs fixed: \1) DefaultCellTextInfo Not Working with Table containing Rows and Cells (PDFNET-3111). \2) Select box and Text field does not work with Adobe 6.0 (PDFNET-3144). Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/79589/ShowThread.aspx#79589 and http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/79588/ShowThread.aspx#79588. \3) FIPS Compliance for SetLicence (PDFNET-3166). Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/thread/80048.aspx. \4) WORD to PDF – Text Missing (PDFNET-3151). Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/79698/ShowThread.aspx#79698. \5) Borders incorrect for Text with margin and first line indent (PDFNET-3150).

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.5.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.5.0.0 New Release What’s New? Image rotaing (PDFNET-3168): A new property RotatingAngle is added into Image class. Image Opacity : A new property Opacity is added into Image class. ZIndex for floating box and image : A new property ZIndex is added into Image, graph and FloatingBox class to control the layer of the image,graph and floating box.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.5.1.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.5.1.0 Hot Fix What’s New? Ellipse (PDFNET-3168): A new class Ellipse is added. Round rectangle : A new property RadiusForRoundCorner is added into Rectangle class. Rich formatting list labels (PDFNET-3130 and PDFNET-3142) : New properties BulletAlignment, BulletColor, IsLableBold, IsLableUnderline, LableFontName, LableFontSize are added into Heading class. Line between columns (PDFNET-3218) : Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/2/81156/ShowThread.aspx#81156 What’s Fixed? Word to PDF - Text gets misaligned after conversion (PDFNET-3206): Refer to http://www.

item.title: Aspose.Pdf .Net 3.5.2.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.5.2.0 Hot Fix What’s New? JavaScript: A new class JavaScript is added to support JavaScript action in Pdf. What’s Fixed? IsKeptWithNext bug for multi-column (PDFNET-3129) HTML to PDF - Cell width to small: 0 (PDFNET-3219): Refer to http://www.aspose.com/Community/Forums/81160/ShowThread.aspx#81160 Word to Pdf - pages distorted (PDFNET-3202) Checkbox Form Field Not displaying in table cell (PDFNET-3203): Refer to http://www.

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 3.5.3.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.5.3.0 Hot Fix What’s New? Section page number symbol(PDFNET-3195): We have supported new symbols: $Sp: the page number in the current section; $SP: the page count of the current section; $SN: the section index of the section in the document Refer to http://www.aspose.com/wiki/default.aspx/Aspose.PDF/SymbolsListAndPurpose.html and http://www.aspose.com/wiki/default.aspx/Aspose.PDF/SymbolsUsage.html about symbols. Borders for Graph and Image (PDFNET-3205) What’s Improved? Text rotating (PDFNET-3251) What’s Fixed?

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 3.5.4.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.5.4.0 Hot Fix What’s New? XMP MetaData(PDFNET-3282): A new class XmpMetadata is added. What’s Fixed? 3305 - One of the footnote is missed 3302 - Absolutely positioned images move depending on other images (BindFO) 3340 - html table overlaying footer 3330 - The line format isn’t corrected display on the PDF 3349 - Word to PDF Error, “Object reference not set to an Instance” 3316 - TOC spacing problem 3337 - Footnote error in Word2Pdf 3338 - Paragraph Relative positioning exception when processing FootNote 3329 - GetMaxColumnWidth doesn’t work on right-to-left 3353 - $Sp does not work when setting StartingPageNumber 3314 - AutoFitToContent problem when setting ColumnsSpan

item.title: Aspose.PDF .NET 3.5.5.0 Hot Fix Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF .Net 3.5.5.0 Hot Fix What’s New? 3281 - Importing data from ASP.NET control DataGrid. A new mothed ImportDataGrid is added into Table class. 3234 - Arrow for line is supported. Two new properties IsAddedArrowAtStart and IsAddedArrowAtEnd are added into GraphInfo. What’s Fixed? 3367 - Some letters are lost when breaking into new page 3385 - “Length can’t be Zero” exception in HTML2PDF 3395 - Table breaks into new page when there is still available space 3326 - Zero default tabstop position is not supported well 3389 - Invalid Cells indexer error in Word2Pdf 3394 - Word To PDF : System.
